1.panel_description: Create a detailed itinerary for a trip to Sydney from October 15th to October 20th, 2024, based on the weather forecast.

1.handles: Fetches latitude and longitude for Sydney

input_vars.name: query_sydney_coordinates
input_vars.description: Query to find latitude and longitude of Sydney
input_vars.value: What is the latitude and longitude of Sydney?

output_vars.name: weather_forecast

5.handles: Gathers information on activities and attractions in Sydney

input_vars.name: activities_query
input_vars.description: Query for activities and attractions in Sydney
input_vars.value: Activities and attractions in Sydney for a young AI Security Researcher

output_vars.name: activities_info
output_vars.description: Information on activities and attractions in Sydney
